name: Rehook.ai
headline: Run, Track and manage any and all user incentive campaigns.
description:
rehook.ai is an all-in-one promotion engine. A complete stack which lets you run referral, loyalty, rewards, discounts, coupons, leaderboards, streaks, tiers etc and is flexible, trackable, scalable and secure.

With an intuitive rule engine, marketers can simply add/edit/change rules to generate coupons/rewards/cashbacks or any other incentives. rehook.ai lets you experiment and personalize campaigns around user segments, geographies, demographics, journeys and any other attribute- without ever going back to tech.

founders.name: Akhil Suhag, Founder
founders.description:
Akhil Suhag is the co-founder and CEO of Rehook.ai (Previously Shopr.tv). Akhil is an alumnus of the Indian School of Business, Hyderabad, and a second time entrepreneur, who previously built and scaled one of India's largest fantasy sports platforms. 

An avid sports nerd, Akhil likes watching and playing several sports. Akhil sets the company strategy and direction, and drives the vision for Rehook.

founders.name: Mukul Anand, Founder
founders.description: Mukul Anand is the Co-founder and CPO of Rehook.ai; before this, he was the Head of Product for one of the largest fantasy sports gaming app FanFight- acquired last year, where he met his current co-founders. He is a product guy at heart, passionate about building products that customers love, and believes in a customer-first approach. He is an IIT Roorkee alumnus who loves writing blogs about start-ups and product management in his leisure time.

founders.name: Tushar Dhara, Founder
founders.description: Tushar Dhara is the co-founder and CTO of rehook.ai, Tushar's first tryst with entrepreneurship was a web development set-up which he started after graduating in Computer Engineering. Before rehook.ai, he was the Vice President, Technology at a fantasy sports start-up, which he scaled to support 8 million registered users. His architecture earned a spot in the AWS showcase (This is My Architecture) and was the subject of an AWS Case Study.

founders.name: Akshay Suhag, Founder
founders.description: Akshay is the Co-founder and COO of rehook.ai. Previously he built and scaled FanFight, one of India's largest Fantasy Sports platforms to 8 million users and 7 million in yearly revenue before being acquired.  Originally from New Delhi, India, he graduated from National Institute of Technology, Allahabad, India where he received a Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology. He is an avid sports fan, especially Cricket, Football and Formula 1.

**Company Overview: Rehook.ai**

Founded in 2021, Rehook.ai is a cutting-edge SaaS company based in Bengaluru, India, and part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 batch. At its core, Rehook.ai is committed to revolutionizing the way businesses run and manage user incentive campaigns. Whether it’s referrals, loyalty programs, discounts, or rewards, Rehook.ai serves as an all-in-one promotion engine that’s flexible, scalable, and secure.

**Mission**

The mission of Rehook.ai is straightforward: to empower businesses to run, track, and manage any and all user incentive campaigns effectively. Their platform allows marketers to experiment and tailor campaigns based on segments, demographics, and user behaviors without needing ongoing technical support.

**Platform Features**

At the heart of Rehook.ai lies an intuitive rule engine that enables users to easily create, edit, and implement rules for generating a variety of incentives, including coupons, rewards, and cashback offers. This versatility means that businesses can personalize their campaigns effortlessly, adapting to various user journeys and attributes to maximize impact.

**Team and Ecosystem**

With a dedicated team of 12 employees, Rehook.ai boasts a nimble structure that is typical of startups with big ambitions. Collaborating with their group partner 'nan,' they are positioned to extend their reach in the B2B marketing landscape alongside other players tagged within the SaaS sector.

**Conclusion**

In a digital marketing landscape that increasingly values personalization and engagement, Rehook.ai stands out by providing a comprehensive solution that’s easy to use and tech-light. For more insight into their offerings, visit their website at [rehook.ai](https://rehook.ai/).
